actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to provide scholarships for the dependent children of public safety officers who are the victims of homicide while performing their official duties.
short_title: Public Safety Officers Memorial Scholarship Act

summary.text: Authorizes the United States Commissioner of Education to award a scholarship for full-time undergraduate study to any child who was a dependent of a public safety officer killed in the performance of duty and who has been accepted for enrollment or is enrolled in an institution of higher education. Sets forth guidelines relative to the amount and duration of such scholarships. Authorizes the Commissioner to enter into agreements with institutions of higher education to facilitate the administration of the scholarship program.

titles.title: Public Safety Officers Memorial Scholarship Act
A bill to provide scholarships for the dependent children of public safety officers who are the victims of homicide while performing their official duties.
